page.title: 05HOUSE STYLE & DISTRIBUTION.
page.content: Most grouped settlements are to the East of the area. The central areas are mostly open fields with isolated farms and cottages. South West Barrows Green district contains a group of houses near the works. New estates are being built in Lingley Green along side an area of recent large bungalows, detached houses and large semi detached. Older semi detached houses are found near Warrington Road and Friends Lane. All the above houses are well kept and have large gardens and garages. Stocks Lane contains some flats, bungalows and 1930's semi - detached. The area around Penketh County School contains some of the oldest houses. e.g. Green Bank House 1869. A desirable district for commuters.
